Turn moments into memories!

Choose us for your next special occasion or get-together.

Got a birthday party, rehearsal dinner, corporate or other event coming up? We're a great option for your gathering! Inquire today and let us know how we can make your special occasion perfect!

Did you know we do catering?

Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from.

Good food is an essential part of any event - let us do the catering and make it one to remember.
Inquire about catering 
Groups & Parties

Host your special event with us

Not only are we professional caterers, but we are also experienced event planners. Our all-in-one packages are designed with your budget in mind, meaning all you have to do is enjoy the event.
Book now a private party Order Online 
Enjoy your favorites anywhere

Don't feel like cooking today? Your favorite food is just a click away. Order online and enjoy!
Order Meet The Owners 
Meet the Obregon brothers. Originally from Peru, they had a dream of sharing Peruvian cuisine and culture with the Charleston community. With years of experience in the hospitality industry, they knew it was their time to create a unique experience for the community.

Reservations

Make some memories

Reservations are not necessary, but they are welcome. Ensure you never miss out. Make an online reservation.

Reviews

Review by - Google

Rich H:
five star review by 
The chicken was outstanding. It's definitely an upgrade from fast food. It is filled with flavor and a healthy option. The inside was spotless...

Review by - Google

Angel C:
five star review by 
First time at Mario's and it is worth the visit. Food and staff are great. Best chicken I've had in a long time...

Review by - Google

five star review by 
Delicious food! Definitely going back!
